name: lowresjam entry
description:
post-jam version here

Classic Roguelike game, where you place traps to save yourself from enemies? Can you advance trough countles levels of madnes, placing and maning your traps with your huge intelect, so that you can find the trap medals?

Im dying as im writting this lmfao

guid, move with arrows, z to place traps, x to switch between them

find the golden thingies to unlock more traps



uhhh this might be slightly glitchy, i procasinated untill like 1 day before the jam and only got aroun 6 hours of work on this, much of that being creating good generation

since i like the game im probably gonna add more things in the future
